## Events.BlockDrag.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BlockDrag` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_block?: Block, opt_isStart?: boolean, opt_blocks?: Block[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_block | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The top block in the stack that is being dragged. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_isStart | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether this is the start of a block drag. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_blocks | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The blocks affected by this drag. Undefined for a blank event. |
